resources.string: This application is for the Police Department
Check if a transit officer can fine you and the correct sanction that applies
Input a keyword for the traffic violation description
Look up the transit officers list able to fine you.
Look up the ammount you should pay for the traffic violation you commit.

Application developed by CityDevs citizen collective. Original idea winner of HackCDMX 2015, Mexico City data festival organized by the Lab for the City. Data used on this project is granted, created and shelter by the Mexico City Police Department.
In Mexico City, only transit agents identified and with a handheld device can fine you..
If a transit agent stops you, you can look up the name and badge number and check if it is able to fine you.
I fou commit a transit violation you can review the process that the agent followed, based on Article 59 of the Metropolitan Transit Law.
Look up the ammount and sanctions that applies for the transit violation you commit.
¿Did the officers identified themselfs with name and badge number?
¿Did the officer pointed out the commited violation?
¿Did the officer pointed out the violation legal basis (article number)?
¿Did the fine match the violation pointed out?
¿Did the officer required and returned your documents?
¿Did the officer give you a copy of your fine?
